channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Enterprise Resource Planning Technology Trends As We Move Toward 2025
item.description: Business strategies are continuously influenced by changes in technology, and 2025 looks to be an incredible year for technical advances.

item.description: You can make ethical shopping choices and find sustainable gifts that are good for you and the environment.

item.title: Operational Excellence Begins With Operational Assessment
